price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߟߊߡߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߖߌ ߦߋ߫ ߕߟߊߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߸ ߡߌ߲߬ߠߌ߲ ߓߍ߯ ߣߴߊ߬ ߣߊ߬ ߕߎߡߊ
arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wanabbi'hum anna al-māa qis'matun baynahum kullu shir'bin muḥ'taḍarun
